title: It needn't happen
creator_contributor_role: Tasmanian Government Film Unit, production company
Australian National Film Board, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Children's accidents - Prevention
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Home accidents - Prevention
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children's accidents - Prevention
description: Warns against accidents to small children in the home through the example of a little girl, the accidents that might have happened and how they could be prevented. Boiling water, medicine and sharp objects left within reach of the child, and over-boisterous games are all potentially dangerous.
